com.mindfusion.charting

Class TowerRenderer

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mindfusion.charting.SeriesRenderer
      • com.mindfusion.charting.TowerRenderer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    DataChangedListener, SeriesContainer, java.util.EventListener

    public class TowerRenderer
extends SeriesRenderer
    Implements a SeriesRenderer used to draw tower charts, rendering series side by side to allow comparing data sequence and sizes.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes

      Defines the signature of delegates called to process tower chart segments.
